original_text: A large herd of pigs was feeding there on the hillside. The demons begged Jesus to let them go into the pigs, and he gave them permission.
korean_text: 마침 그 곳에 많은 돼지 떼가 산에서 먹고 있는지라 귀신들이 그 돼지에게로 들어가게 허락하심을 간구하니 이에 허락하시니

sentences.original_text: A large herd of pigs was feeding there
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 돼지 떼가 그곳에서 먹고 있었다

sentences.original_text: to let them go into the pigs
